message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. This is a great deal considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9000 is simply too low.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need to stay above $10000 to make this worthwhile for me.  How about we settle on $10500? This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.  Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10250. This is the highest I can go, but I'm really interested in making a deal.
